query: mutation(  $device_uuid: String!, $timezone: String!,  $device_token: String!,  $buffer_mins:Int!, $middayLabel: String!,$middayDow: Dows!,$middayHr: Hours !, $middayMin: Mins!) {upsert_schedule(timezone: $timezone,device_token: $device_token, device_uuid: $device_uuid, buffer_mins:$buffer_mins, entries: [{label: $middayLabel,dow: $middayDow, hr: $middayHr, min: $middayMin},] ){ id } }
